Post.Title: GCDAsyncSocket APNs Testing
Post.Text:
- (void)viewDidLoad

{

   [super viewDidLoad];

   self.socket = [[GCDAsyncSocket alloc] initWithDelegate:self delegateQueue:dispatch_get_main_queue()];

   [self.socket connectToHost:@"gateway.push.apple.com" onPort:2195 error:nil];

}

- (void)socket:(GCDAsyncSocket *)sock didConnectToHost:(NSString *)host port:(uint16_t)port{

   

   // Read .p12 file

   NSString *path = [[NSBundle mainBundle] pathForResource:@"test" ofType:@"p12"];

   NSData *pkcs12data = [[NSData alloc] initWithContentsOfFile:path];

   

   // Import .p12 data

   CFArrayRef keyref = NULL;

   OSStatus sanityChesk = SecPKCS12Import(

                                          (__bridge CFDataRef)pkcs12data,

                                          (__bridge CFDictionaryRef)@{

                                                                      (__bridge id)kSecImportExportPassphrase : @"password"},

                                          &keyref);

   if (sanityChesk != noErr) {

       NSLog(@"Error while importing pkcs12 [%ld]", sanityChesk);

   } else

       NSLog(@"Success opening p12 certificate.");

   

   // Identity

   CFDictionaryRef identityDict = CFArrayGetValueAtIndex(keyref, 0);

   SecIdentityRef identityRef = (SecIdentityRef)CFDictionaryGetValue(identityDict,

                                                                     kSecImportItemIdentity);

   

   // Cert

   SecCertificateRef cert = NULL;

   OSStatus status = SecIdentityCopyCertificate(identityRef, &cert);

   if (status)

       NSLog(@"SecIdentityCopyCertificate failed.");

   

   // the certificates array, containing the identity then the root certificate

   NSArray *myCerts = @[(__bridge id)identityRef, (__bridge id)cert];

   

   NSDictionary *settings = @{

                              (__bridge id)kCFStreamSSLAllowsExpiredRoots : @YES,

                              (__bridge id)kCFStreamSSLAllowsExpiredCertificates : @YES,

                              (__bridge id)kCFStreamSSLAllowsAnyRoot : @YES,

                              (__bridge id)kCFStreamSSLValidatesCertificateChain : @NO,

                              (__bridge id)kCFStreamSSLPeerName : @"gateway.push.apple.com:2195",

                              (__bridge id)kCFStreamSSLLevel : (__bridge id)kCFStreamSocketSecurityLevelNegotiatedSSL,

                              (__bridge id)kCFStreamPropertySocketSecurityLevel : (__bridge id)kCFStreamSocketSecurityLevelNegotiatedSSL,

                              (__bridge id)kCFStreamSSLCertificates : myCerts,

                              (__bridge id)kCFStreamSSLIsServer : @NO

                              

                              };

   [sock startTLS:settings];

   

}

/**

* Called after the socket has successfully completed SSL/TLS negotiation.

* This method is not called unless you use the provided startTLS method.

*

* If a SSL/TLS negotiation fails (invalid certificate, etc) then the socket will immediately close,

* and the socketDidDisconnect:withError: delegate method will be called with the specific SSL error code.

**/

- (void)socketDidSecure:(GCDAsyncSocket *)sock{

   NSLog(@"%s",__func__);

   

   NSMutableData * data = [NSMutableData data];

   UInt8 byte = 1;

   [data appendBytes:&byte length:1];

   

   UInt8 identifier[4] = {0,0,0,0x01};

   [data appendBytes:identifier length:4];

   

   UInt8 expiry[4] = {0,0,0,0x10};

   [data appendBytes:expiry length:4];

   

   UInt8 length [2] = {0,0x20};

   [data appendBytes:length length:2];

   

   NSData *deviceToken = "deviceTokenData";

   [data appendData: deviceToken];

   

   NSDictionary * payload = @{@"aps" : @{

                                      @"alert": @"you have push!" ,

                                      @"sound" : @"default" ,

                                      @"badge" : @10}

                              };

   NSData * payload_data = [NSJSONSerialization dataWithJSONObject:payload options:kNilOptions error:nil];

   

   UInt8 payload_length [2] = {0,payload_data.length};

   [data appendBytes:payload_length length:2];

   

   [data appendData:payload_data];

   

   [sock writeData:data withTimeout:-1 tag:0];

   

}

打开QQ邮箱，然后成功迅速简便的完成了CSV转成vcf格式的单个文件。过程如下：


1. 打开QQ邮箱，点到"联系人"，右侧栏“工具”小按钮，点击选择"导入联系人"，弹出小窗口里面注意"联系人分组"，新建一个分组。然后导入你的csv文件。

2. 导入完成之后，开始导出vcf，还是"工具"小按钮，点击选择"导出联系人"。在 弹出小窗口中注意选择分组，选择刚刚新建的xx分组，点击"导出"。
这样简单两步就生成了一个vcf文件。拷到手机里面或使用iCloud同步，导入联系人成功。

就像一张破碎的脸

难以开口道再见

就让一切走远

这不是件容易的事

我们却都没有哭泣

让它淡淡的来

让它好好的去

到如今年复一年

我不能停止怀念

怀念你怀念从前

但愿那海风再起

只为那浪花的手

 

恰似你的温柔

CentOS Apache、PHP、mySQL默认安装路径
Post.Text:
Apache:

如果采用RPM包安装，安装路径应在 /etc/httpd目录下

Apache配置文件:/etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf

Apache模块路径：/usr/sbin/apachectl

web目录:/var/www/html

如果采用源代码安装，一般默认安装在/usr/local/apache2目录下

 

PHP:

如果采用RPM包安装，安装路径应在 /etc/目录下

PHP的配置文件:/etc/php.ini

如果采用源代码安装，一般默认安装在/usr/local/lib目录下

PHP配置文件: /usr/local/lib/php.ini

或/usr/local/php/etc/php.ini

 

mySQL:

如果采用RPM包安装，安装路径应在/usr/share/mysql目录下

mysqldump文件位置：/usr/bin/mysqldump

mySQL配置文件:

/etc/my.cnf或/usr/share/mysql/my.cnf

mySQL数据目录在/var/lib/mysql目录下

如果采用源代码安装，一般默认安装在/usr/local/mysql目录下

Post.Desc:

赞啊！Ann Street Studio 的都是精品！

生命的泉源:

Seeing New York
through my Giorgio Armani lenses

  As a photographer I show you the world through my lens on a daily basis.
We all look at New York, she demands our focused attention. I’ve been thinking
about the art of looking. The importance of focusing and what we see. This past
March I bought a pair of Giorgio Armani frames in Geneva, classic per usual, and I decided to put them in front of the frame. To see what I see.

To show you a day in New York through my lens…

options:NSNumericSearch] \

  }

Post.Title: APNS
Post.Text:
步骤1. 证书-钥匙串访问-证书处理- 从认定颁发机构请求证书-输入常用EMAIL与常用名称-保存CertificateSigningRequest.certSigningRequest





生成后会在密钥里生成一对公/私钥 .p12，私钥(key.p12)用以关联下面将要生成的证书(aps.cer)

步骤2. 区分sandbox与production，服务器推送的链接不同



选择一个创建好的拥有push notification功能的app id，没有则提示创建；上传步骤1生成的

Dev:

创建一对密钥，关联Development证书，创建一对密钥关联APNS sandbox证书；

创建Development Provisioning Profile，创建服务器Javapns需要的p12;

打包安装。

aps_development: gateway.sandbox.push.apple.com:2195



 

Production:

创建一对密钥，关联Distribution证书，创建一对密钥关联APNS production证书；

创建Distribution Provisioning Profile (In-house 或 Ad Hoc)，创建服务器Javapns需要的p12;

打包安装。

aps_production   : gateway.push.apple.com:2195


Javapns:

1. openssl x509 -in aps.cer -inform DER -out aps.pem -outform PEM

2. openssl pkcs12 -nocerts -out key.pem -in key.p12

3. openssl pkcs12 -export -in aps.pem -inkey key.pem -certfile CertificateSigningRequest.certSigningRequest -name "push" -out push.p12

Post.Text:
- (void)redirectNSlogToDocumentFolder
{
    NSArray *paths = NSSearchPathForDirectoriesInDomains(NSDocumentDirectory, NSUserDomainMask, YES);
    NSString *documentDirectory = [paths objectAtIndex:0];
    NSString *fileName = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"dr.log"];
    NSString *logFilePath = [documentDirectory stringByAppendingPathComponent:fileName];
                 
    NSFileManager *defaultManager = [NSFileManager defaultManager];
    [defaultManager removeItemAtPath:logFilePath error:nil];
                 
    freopen([logFilePath cStringUsingEncoding:NSASCIIStringEncoding], "a+", stdout);
    freopen([logFilePath cStringUsingEncoding:NSASCIIStringEncoding], "a+", stderr);
} 
              
- (BOOL)application:(UIApplication *)application didFinishLaunchingWithOptions:(NSDictionary *)launchOptions{
/*******************************************************************************/
// 当真机连接Mac调试的时候把这些注释掉，否则log只会输入到文件中，而不能从xcode的监视器中看到。
// 如果是真机就保存到Document目录下的dr.log文件中
    UIDevice *device = [UIDevice currentDevice];
    if (![[device model] isEqualToString:@"iPad Simulator"]) {
        [self redirectNSlogToDocumentFolder];
    }
/*******************************************************************************/
配置共享文件夹：
添加Application supports iTunes file sharing键，并将键值设置为YES。

Post.SongName: 今生今世 遥不可及 (2013版)

Post.Desc:
CinemaGraphs:

Nature Studies

Yesterday the most magical thing happened, a butterfly flew into the studio, dancing around all the little flower arrangements left over from last week’s shoot. There is something special about nature when it’s brought indoors.  As I watched this delicate little creature flutter around our lofty space it reminded me of childhood memories in Texas, chasing monarchs through the yard. We talk a lot about the meaning of acinemagraph, how it exists as living photo. We wanted to cinemagraph this moment to forever remember the simple joy of nature fluttering in our open windows and making us stop and smile at its beauty. I wanted to remember the little girl I once was who had nothing to worry about on those summer afternoons but to study butterflies and be enchanted by nature…

PS- did you know we once bought sleeping butterflies for a photo shoot? They come in envelopes in a box with an ice pack. The cool temperature makes them dormant and you can dip your finger in orange soda or some sort of sweet liquid and place them there where they will stay, wake up, drink, flap there wings for a couple of mins before flying off. It’s really the most fun!

*we took the butterfly outside and released it back on its journey in the middle of Manhattan*

//
//  SSNavigationController.h

//
//  Created by mysteri0uss on 13-8-31.
//  Copyright (c) 2013年 . All rights reserved.
//
   
/*  Scale and Slide UINavigationController */
   
   
#import <UIKit/UIKit.h>
   
@interface SSNavigationController : UINavigationController
@property (nonatomic, assign) CGFloat scale;
@end
   
//
//  SSNavigationViewController.m

//
//  Created by mysteri0uss on 13-8-31.
//  Copyright (c) 2013年 . All rights reserved.
//
   
   
#define KEY_WINDOW  [[[UIApplication sharedApplication] delegate] window]
   
   
#import "SSNavigationController.h"
   
@interface SSNavigationController ()
{
    UIView          * BACKGROUND;
    UIImageView     * SCREENSHOT;
    UIView          * ALPHABLACK;
    NSMutableArray  * SCREENSHOT_IMAGES;
       
    UIPanGestureRecognizer *RECOGNIZER;
    CGPoint START_TOUCH;
    BOOL    FINGER_IS_MOVING;
    BOOL    CAN_DRAG_BACK;
}
   
@end
   
@implementation SSNavigationController
   
- (void)dealloc{
#if ! ( __has_feature(objc_arc) )
    [RECOGNIZER release];
    [BACKGROUND release];
    [SCREENSHOT_IMAGES release];
    [ALPHABLACK release];
    [SCREENSHOT_IMAGES release];
    [super dealloc];
#endif
}
   
- (void)viewDidLoad
{
    [super viewDidLoad];
    // Do any additional setup after loading the view.
       
    SCREENSHOT_IMAGES = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];
    CAN_DRAG_BACK = YES;
       
    RECOGNIZER = [[UIPanGestureRecognizer alloc] initWithTarget:self action:@selector(paningGestureReceive:)];
    [self.view addGestureRecognizer:RECOGNIZER];
       
    _scale = 0.95f;
}
   
- (void)didReceiveMemoryWarning
{
    [super didReceiveMemoryWarning];
    // Dispose of any resources that can be recreated.
}
   
- (void)prepareForTransition{
       
    CGRect frame = self.view.bounds;
       
//    NSLog(@"%@",NSStringFromCGRect(frame));
       
    BACKGROUND = [[UIView alloc]initWithFrame:frame];
    ALPHABLACK = [[UIView alloc]initWithFrame:frame];
    SCREENSHOT = [[UIImageView alloc] initWithFrame:frame];
    ALPHABLACK.backgroundColor = [UIColor blackColor];
       
       
        //FOR VERTICAL STATUS BAR -- NEED CONSIDERAION AFTER
        UIView * STATUSBAR = [[UIView alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(0, 0, frame.size.width, 20)];
        STATUSBAR.backgroundColor = [UIColor blackColor];
        [SCREENSHOT addSubview:STATUSBAR];
        //[statusbarview release];
       
    [BACKGROUND addSubview:ALPHABLACK];
    [BACKGROUND insertSubview:SCREENSHOT belowSubview:ALPHABLACK];
       
    [SCREENSHOT setImage: [SCREENSHOT_IMAGES lastObject]];
    [SCREENSHOT setTransform:CGAffineTransformIdentity];
    [ALPHABLACK setAlpha:0.8];
       
    [self.view.superview insertSubview:BACKGROUND belowSubview:self.view];
       
       
}
   
- (void)finishTransition{
    [SCREENSHOT removeFromSuperview];
    [ALPHABLACK removeFromSuperview];
    [BACKGROUND removeFromSuperview];
}
   
// set lastScreenShotView 's position and alpha when paning
- (void)moveViewWithX:(float)x
{
       
    //    NSLog(@"Move to:%f",x);
       
    x = x>320?320:x;
    x = x<0?0:x;
       
    CGRect frame = self.view.frame;
    frame.origin.x = x;
    self.view.frame = frame;
       
    // tabbar not involved, try at here
       
       
    //  (320 / 1280 = 0.25, 320 / 400 = 0.8)  scale become 1 , black become clear
    float scale = ( x/ (320.0f / (1 - _scale) ) )+_scale;
    float alpha = 0.8 - (x/400);
       
    SCREENSHOT.transform = CGAffineTransformMakeScale(scale, scale);
    ALPHABLACK.alpha = alpha;
       
}
   
extern  CGImageRef UIGetScreenImage();
- (UIImage *)imageWithScreenContents
{
    CGImageRef cgScreen = UIGetScreenImage();
    if (cgScreen) {
        UIImage *result = [UIImage imageWithCGImage:cgScreen];
        CGImageRelease(cgScreen);
        return result;
    }
    return nil;
}
   
   
- (void)pushViewController:(UIViewController *)viewController animated:(BOOL)animated{
    UIImage * screenshot = [self imageWithScreenContents];
//    NSLog(@"%@",screenshot);
    if (screenshot && CAN_DRAG_BACK) {
        [SCREENSHOT_IMAGES addObject:screenshot];
        [super pushViewController:viewController animated:NO];
        [self prepareForTransition];
        [self moveViewWithX:320];
        [UIView animateWithDuration:.3 delay:0 options:UIViewAnimationOptionCurveEaseInOut animations:^{
            [self moveViewWithX:0];
        } completion:^(BOOL finished) {
            [self finishTransition];
        }];
    }else{
        [super pushViewController:viewController animated:YES];
    }
}
   
- (UIViewController *)popViewControllerAnimated:(BOOL)animated
{
    void(^block)(void)  = ^(){
        [SCREENSHOT_IMAGES removeLastObject];
        [super popViewControllerAnimated:NO];
        CGRect frame = self.view.frame;
        frame.origin.x = 0;
        self.view.frame = frame;
        [self finishTransition];
           
    };
    if (animated) {
        [self prepareForTransition];
        [self moveViewWithX:0];
        [UIView animateWithDuration:.3 delay:0 options:UIViewAnimationOptionCurveEaseInOut animations:^{
              
            [self moveViewWithX:320];
        } completion:^(BOOL finished) {
            block();
        }];
           
    }else{
        block();
    }
    return nil;
       
}
   
#pragma mark -
- (void)paningGestureReceive:(UIPanGestureRecognizer *)recoginzer
{
    // If the viewControllers has only one vc or disable the interaction, then return.
    if (self.viewControllers.count <= 1 || !CAN_DRAG_BACK) return;
       
    // we get the touch position by the window's coordinate
    CGPoint touchPoint = [recoginzer locationInView:KEY_WINDOW];
       
    // begin paning, show the backgroundView(last screenshot),if not exist, create it.
    if (recoginzer.state == UIGestureRecognizerStateBegan) {
           
        FINGER_IS_MOVING = YES;
        START_TOUCH = touchPoint;
   
        [self prepareForTransition];
           
        //End paning, always check that if it should move right or move left automatically
    }else if (recoginzer.state == UIGestureRecognizerStateEnded){
           
        //if ${move} beyond 100 then pop
        if (touchPoint.x - START_TOUCH.x > 100) 
        {
            [UIView animateWithDuration:.3 delay:0 options:UIViewAnimationOptionCurveEaseInOut animations:^{
                [self moveViewWithX:320];
            } completion:^(BOOL finished) {
                [self popViewControllerAnimated:NO];
                FINGER_IS_MOVING = NO;
            }];
        }
        //else move back.
        else
        {
            [UIView animateWithDuration:.3 delay:0 options:UIViewAnimationOptionCurveEaseInOut animations:^{
                [self moveViewWithX:0];
            } completion:^(BOOL finished) {
                FINGER_IS_MOVING = NO;
            }];
               
        }
        return;
        // cancal panning, alway move to left side automatically
    }else if (recoginzer.state == UIGestureRecognizerStateCancelled){
        [UIView animateWithDuration:.3 delay:0 options:UIViewAnimationOptionCurveEaseInOut animations:^{
            [self moveViewWithX:0];
        } completion:^(BOOL finished) {
            FINGER_IS_MOVING = NO;
        }];    
    }
       
    if (FINGER_IS_MOVING) {
        [self moveViewWithX:touchPoint.x - START_TOUCH.x];
    }
}
   
@end

//
//  ClothesInfoAddBasicCellHeaderView.m
//  Clothes

#import "ClothesInfoAddBasicCellHeaderView.h"
#import "ClothesInfoAddViewController.h"
#import "UIImageExtras.h"
 
#import "MLNavigationController.h"
#import <CommonCrypto/CommonDigest.h>
@interface NSString (md5)
-(NSString *) md5HexDigest;
@end
 
@implementation NSString (md5)
 
-(NSString *) md5HexDigest
{
    const char *original_str = [self UTF8String];
    unsigned char result[CC_MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH];
    CC_MD5(original_str, strlen(original_str), result);
    NSMutableString *hash = [NSMutableString string];
    for (int i = 0; i < 16; i++)
        [hash appendFormat:@"%02X", result[i]];
    return hash;
}
 
@end
 
@implementation ClothesInfoAddBasicCellHeaderView
 
- (id)initWithFrame:(CGRect)frame :(id<ClothesInfoProtocol>)delegate
{
    self = [super initWithFrame:frame];
    if (self) {
        // Initialization code
        self.delegate = delegate;
        dispatch_async(dispatch_get_global_queue(0, 0), ^{
            UIImage * header_image = [UIImage imageNamed:@"clothes_default_clothes"];
            UIImage * take_image = [UIImage imageNamed:@"camera_take"];
            dispatch_async(dispatch_get_main_queue(), ^{
                _header = [[UIImageView alloc] initWithImage:header_image];
                take = [[UIImageView alloc] initWithImage:take_image];
                 
                [_header setFrame:self.bounds];
                [take setFrame:CGRectMake(52, 83, 40, 40)];
                 
                [self addSubview:_header];
//                [self addSubview:take];
                 
                takebtn = [[UIButton alloc] initWithFrame:_header.frame];
                [takebtn addTarget:self action:@selector(take_:) forControlEvents:UIControlEventTouchUpInside];
                [self addSubview:takebtn];
            });
 
        });
    }
    return self;
}
 
- (IBAction)take_:(id)sender{
    //&& [UIImagePickerController isSourceTypeAvailable:(UIImagePickerControllerSourceTypeCamera)]
    if ([UIImagePickerController isSourceTypeAvailable:(UIImagePickerControllerSourceTypePhotoLibrary)] ) {
        UIActionSheet * sheet = [[UIActionSheet alloc] initWithTitle:@"" delegate:self cancelButtonTitle:@"取消" destructiveButtonTitle:nil otherButtonTitles:@"从相册选择照片",@"使用相机拍照", nil];
        [sheet showInView:self];
    }
    
}
 
- (void)actionSheet:(UIActionSheet *)actionSheet didDismissWithButtonIndex:(NSInteger)buttonIndex{
    switch (buttonIndex) {
        case 0:
        {
             
            if ([self.delegate isKindOfClass:[ClothesInfoAddViewController class]]) {
                ClothesInfoAddViewController * infovc = (ClothesInfoAddViewController *)(self.delegate);
                if ([infovc.class isSubclassOfClass:[UIViewController class]]) {
                    QBImagePickerController *imagePickerController = [[QBImagePickerController alloc] init];
                    imagePickerController.delegate = self;
                    MLNavigationController *navigationController = [[MLNavigationController alloc] initWithRootViewController:imagePickerController];
                    [infovc.navigationController presentCustomModalViewController:navigationController animated:YES completion:NULL];
 
                }
                else{
                    NSLog(@"line 89 :delegate不为UIViewController的子类，无法打开");
                }
            }
        }
            break;
             
        case 1:
        {
             
        }
            break;
             
        default:
            break;
    }
}
 
- (void)imagePickerController:(QBImagePickerController *)imagePickerController didFinishPickingMediaWithInfo:(id)info
{
 
        if(imagePickerController.allowsMultipleSelection) {
            NSArray *mediaInfoArray = (NSArray *)info;
             
            NSLog(@"Selected %d photos", mediaInfoArray.count);
        } else {
            NSDictionary *mediaInfo = (NSDictionary *)info;
            NSLog(@"Selected: %@", mediaInfo);
            UIImage * image = mediaInfo[@"UIImagePickerControllerOriginalImage"];
            NSString * imagePath = [mediaInfo[@"UIImagePickerControllerReferenceURL"] absoluteString]  ;
             
            NSLog(@"%@,%@",NSStringFromCGSize(image.size),imagePath);
             
            UIImage * smallImage = [image cropCenterAndScaleImageToSize:CGSizeMake(178, 242)];
            UIImage * screenImage = [image cropCenterAndScaleImageToSize:CGSizeMake(300, 450)];
            UIImage * largeImage = [image cropCenterAndScaleImageToSize:CGSizeMake(640, [UIScreen mainScreen].bounds.size.height * 2)];
             
            NSString * path = [NSHomeDirectory() stringByAppendingPathComponent:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"Documents/ClothesImages/%@",[imagePath md5HexDigest]]];
             
            BOOL created = NO;
             
            if (![[NSFileManager defaultManager] fileExistsAtPath:path]) {
                created = [[NSFileManager defaultManager] createDirectoryAtPath:path withIntermediateDirectories:YES attributes:nil error:nil];
                 
                if (created) {
                    [UIImageJPEGRepresentation(smallImage, 1) writeToFile:[path stringByAppendingPathComponent:@"small"] atomically:YES];
                    [UIImageJPEGRepresentation(screenImage, 1) writeToFile:[path stringByAppendingPathComponent:@"screen"] atomically:YES];
                    [UIImageJPEGRepresentation(largeImage, 1) writeToFile:[path stringByAppendingPathComponent:@"large"] atomically:YES];
                    [self.delegate.clothesInfo setImage:path];
                    [self.header setImage:smallImage];
   
                }
 
            }else{
                created = YES;
                [self.delegate.clothesInfo setImage:path];
                [self.header setImage:smallImage];
            }
        }
 
        [imagePickerController dismissCustomModalViewControllerAnimated:YES completion:NULL];
}
 
- (void)imagePickerControllerDidCancel:(QBImagePickerController *)imagePickerController
{
 
        NSLog(@"Cancelled");
        [imagePickerController dismissCustomModalViewControllerAnimated:YES completion:NULL];
    
}
 
- (NSString *)descriptionForSelectingAllAssets:(QBImagePickerController *)imagePickerController
{
    return @"すべての写真を選択";
}
 
- (NSString *)descriptionForDeselectingAllAssets:(QBImagePickerController *)imagePickerController
{
    return @"すべての写真の選択を解除";
}
 
- (NSString *)imagePickerController:(QBImagePickerController *)imagePickerController descriptionForNumberOfPhotos:(NSUInteger)numberOfPhotos
{
    return [NSString stringWithFormat:@"写真%d枚", numberOfPhotos];
}
 
- (NSString *)imagePickerController:(QBImagePickerController *)imagePickerController descriptionForNumberOfVideos:(NSUInteger)numberOfVideos
{
    return [NSString stringWithFormat:@"ビデオ%d本", numberOfVideos];
}
 
- (NSString *)imagePickerController:(QBImagePickerController *)imagePickerController descriptionForNumberOfPhotos:(NSUInteger)numberOfPhotos numberOfVideos:(NSUInteger)numberOfVideos
{
    return [NSString stringWithFormat:@"写真%d枚、ビデオ%d本", numberOfPhotos, numberOfVideos];
}
@end
 
@implementation ClothesInfoAddBasicCellHeaderPicker
 
 
 
- (id)init{
 
    self = [superinit];
 
    if (self) {
 
        self.delegate = self;
 
    }
 
    returnself;
 
}
 
 
 
- (void)navigationController:(UINavigationController *)navigationController willShowViewController:(UIViewController *)viewController animated:(BOOL)animated
 
{
 
    UIButton * cancel = [UIButtonbuttonWithType:UIButtonTypeCustom];
 
    [cancel setFrame:CGRectMake(0, 8, 32, 32)];
 
    [cancel setImage:[UIImageimageNamed:@"navV"] forState:UIControlStateNormal];
 
    [cancel addTarget:selfaction:@selector(dismiss) forControlEvents:UIControlEventTouchUpInside];
 
    UIBarButtonItem *btn = [[UIBarButtonItemalloc] initWithCustomView:cancel];
 
    [viewController.navigationItemsetRightBarButtonItem:btn animated:NO];
 
}
 
- (void)dismiss{
 
    [selfdismissCustomModalViewControllerAnimated:YEScompletion:NULL];
 
}
 
 
 
- (void)imagePickerController:(UIImagePickerController *)picker didFinishPickingImage:(UIImage *)image editingInfo:(NSDictionary *)editingInfo{
 
    NSLog(@"%@",NSStringFromCGSize(image.size));
 
     
 
    UIImage * smallImage = [image cropCenterAndScaleImageToSize:CGSizeMake(178, 242)];
 
    UIImage * screenImage = [image cropCenterAndScaleImageToSize:CGSizeMake(300, 450)];
 
    UIImage * largeImage = [image cropCenterAndScaleImageToSize:CGSizeMake(640, [UIScreenmainScreen].bounds.size.height * 2)];
 
     
 
    NSString * path = [NSHomeDirectory() stringByAppendingPathComponent:[NSStringstringWithFormat:@"Documents/ClothesImages/%@",[[self.headerview.delegate.clothesInfo.objectID.URIRepresentationabsoluteString] lastPathComponent]]];
 
     
 
    BOOL created = NO;
 
     
 
    if (![[NSFileManagerdefaultManager] fileExistsAtPath:path]) {
 
       created = [[NSFileManagerdefaultManager] createDirectoryAtPath:path withIntermediateDirectories:YESattributes:nilerror:nil];
 
    }else{
 
        created = YES;
 
    }
 
    if (created) {
 
        [UIImageJPEGRepresentation(smallImage, 1) writeToFile:[path stringByAppendingPathComponent:@"small"] atomically:YES];
 
        [UIImageJPEGRepresentation(screenImage, 1) writeToFile:[path stringByAppendingPathComponent:@"screen"] atomically:YES];
 
        [UIImageJPEGRepresentation(largeImage, 1) writeToFile:[path stringByAppendingPathComponent:@"large"] atomically:YES];
 
         
 
        [self.headerview.delegate.clothesInfosetImage:path];       
 
        [self.headerview.headersetImage:smallImage];
 
    }
 
 
 
     
 
    [selfdismiss];
 
}
 
 
 
@end

+ (NSData *)DESDecryptWithKey:(NSString *)key :(unsigned char *)data :(NSUInteger)dataLength{
    // 'key' should be 8 bytes for DES, will be null-padded otherwise
      
    char keyPtr[kCCKeySizeDES + 1]; // room for terminator (unused)
      
    bzero( keyPtr, sizeof( keyPtr ) ); // fill with zeroes (for padding)
      
    // fetch key data
      
    [key getCString:keyPtr maxLength:sizeof( keyPtr ) encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
      
    printf("%s\n",keyPtr);
      
      
    NSLog(@"dataLength:%u",dataLength);
      
    //See the doc: For block ciphers, the output size will always be less than or
      
    //equal to the input size plus the size of one block.
      
    //That's why we need to add the size of one block here
      
    size_t bufferSize = dataLength + kCCBlockSizeDES;
      
    void *buffer = malloc( bufferSize );
      
    size_t numBytesDecrypted = 0;
      
    CCCryptorStatus cryptStatus = CCCrypt( kCCDecrypt, kCCAlgorithmDES, kCCOptionECBMode,
                                            
                                          keyPtr, kCCKeySizeDES,
                                            
                                          NULL
                                            
                                          /* initialization vector (optional) */,
                                            
                                          (const void *)data, dataLength, /* input */
                                            
                                          buffer, bufferSize, /* output */
                                            
                                          &numBytesDecrypted );
      
    if( cryptStatus == kCCSuccess )
          
    {
          
        //the returned NSData takes ownership of the buffer and will free it on deallocation
        NSLog(@"%zd",numBytesDecrypted);
        return [NSData dataWithBytesNoCopy:buffer length:numBytesDecrypted];
          
    }
      
    free( buffer ); //free the buffer
      
    return nil;
  
}

Relationship Delete Rules

 

Deny

If there is at least one object at the relationship destination, then the source object cannot be deleted.

For example, if you want to remove a department, you must ensure that all the employees in that

department are first transferred elsewhere (or fired!) otherwise the department cannot be deleted.

Nullify

Set the inverse relationship for objects at the destination to null.

For example, if you delete a department, set the department for all the current members to null. This

only makes sense if the department relationship for an employee is optional, or if you ensure that you

set a new department for each of the employees before the next save operation.

Cascade

Delete the objects at the destination of the relationship.

For example, if you delete a department, fire all the employees in that department at the same time.

No Action

Do nothing to the object at the destination of the relationship.

For example, if you delete a department, leave all the employees as they are, even if they still believe

they belong to that department.

/* 用法: XcodeProjectPatch {project_path}/{project_name}.xcodeproj {framework_name}.framework ... */
 
#import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
 
#define pb(path) [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%s/%@",path, @"project.pbxproj"]
 
#define k_objects     @"objects"
#define k_isa         @"isa"
#define k_files       @"files"
#define k_name        @"name"
#define k_children    @"children"
#define k_path        @"path"
#define k_sourceTree  @"sourceTree"
#define k_fileRef     @"fileRef"
#define k_lastKnownFileType         @"lastKnownFileType"
#define kFrameworks                 @"Frameworks"
#define kPBXFileReference           @"PBXFileReference"
#define kPBXFrameworksBuildPhase    @"PBXFrameworksBuildPhase"
#define kPBXGroup                   @"PBXGroup"
#define kPBXBuildFile               @"PBXBuildFile"
 
static long xtol(const char *s)
{
    return strtol(s,NULL,16);
}
 
@interface pbkey : NSObject{
        int _first;
        int _middle;
        int _last;
}
 
-(instancetype)initWithString:(NSString *)str;
 
-(NSString *)next;
 
+(NSString *)next:(NSString *)before;
 
@end
 
@implementation pbkey
 
-(instancetype)initWithString:(NSString *)str{
    if (str.length == 24) {
         
        NSString * first  = [str substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(0, 8)];
        NSString * middle = [str substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(8, 8)];
        NSString * last   = [str substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(16, 8)];
         
        self = [super init];
        if (self) {
            _first  = (int)xtol([first UTF8String]);
            _middle = (int)xtol([middle UTF8String]);
            _last   = (int)xtol([last UTF8String]);
        }
        return self;
    }
    return nil;
}
-(NSString *)next{
     
    if (_last > 2) {
        _last -= 2;
    }else if (_middle > 2) {
        _middle -= 2;
    }else if ( _first > 2) {
        _first -= 2;
    }
     
    return [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%08X%08X%08X",_first,_middle,_last];
}
 
-(int)compare:(NSString *)str{
    if (str.length == 24) { //e.g. 7DFD8C2317B9E281005D6021
         
        NSString * first  = [str substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(0, 8)];
        NSString * middle = [str substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(8, 8)];
        NSString * last   = [str substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(16, 8)];
         
        int t_first = (int)xtol([first UTF8String]);
        int t_middle = (int)xtol([middle UTF8String]);
        int t_last = (int)xtol([last UTF8String]);
         
        if (_first < t_first) {
            return -1;
        }else if (_first == t_first){
            if (_middle < t_middle) {
                return -1;
            }else if (_middle == t_middle){
                if (_last < t_last) {
                    return -1;
                }else if (_last == t_last){
                    return 0;
                }else{
                    return 1;
                }
            }else{
                return 1;
            }
        }else{
            return 1;
        }
         
    }
    return -2;
}
 
+(NSString *)next:(NSString *)before{
    pbkey * key = [[[pbkey alloc] initWithString:before] autorelease];
    return [key next];
}
 
+(int)compare:(NSString *)str1 with:(NSString *)str2{
    pbkey * key1 = [[[pbkey alloc] initWithString:str1] autorelease];
    return [key1 compare:str2];
}
 
@end
 
 
@interface pbxproj : NSObject
 
+(instancetype)projectWithContentsOfFile:(NSString *)apath;
 
-(NSArray *) frameworks;
 
-(BOOL) PBXGroup_Frameworks_AddChild :(NSString *) child;
 
-(BOOL) save;
 
@end
 
@interface pbxproj ()
 
@property (nonatomic, retain) NSString * pb_path;
@property (nonatomic, retain) NSDictionary * pb_dic;
@property (nonatomic, retain) NSMutableDictionary * pb_objects;
@property (nonatomic, retain) NSDictionary * pb_frameworks;
@property (nonatomic, retain) NSDictionary * pb_frameworks_buildphase;
 
/*
 7DFD8C2317B9E281005D6021 / * Frameworks * / = {
 isa = PBXGroup;
 children = (
 7DFD8C2417B9E281005D6021 / * UIKit.framework * /,
 7DFD8C2617B9E281005D6021 / * Foundation.framework * /,
 7DFD8C2817B9E281005D6021 / * CoreGraphics.framework * /,
 );
 name = Frameworks;
 sourceTree = "<group>";
 };
 */
 
/*
 7DFD8C2417B9E281005D6021 / * UIKit.framework * / = {
 isa = PBXFileReference;
 lastKnownFileType = wrapper.framework; 
 name = UIKit.framework; 
 path = System/Library/Frameworks/UIKit.framework; 
 sourceTree = SDKROOT; };
 */
-(NSString *) PBXFileReference_Add :(NSDictionary *)child;
 
/*
 7DFD8C1E17B9E281005D6021 / * Frameworks * / = {
 isa = PBXFrameworksBuildPhase;
 buildActionMask = 2147483647;
 files = (
 7DFD8C2517B9E281005D6021 / * UIKit.framework in Frameworks * /,
 7DFD8C2717B9E281005D6021 / * Foundation.framework in Frameworks * /,
 7DFD8C2917B9E281005D6021 / * CoreGraphics.framework in Frameworks * /,
 );
 runOnlyForDeploymentPostprocessing = 0;
 };
 */
 
/*
7DFD8C2517B9E281005D6021 / * UIKit.framework in Frameworks * / = {
 isa = PBXBuildFile; fileRef = 7DFD8C2417B9E281005D6021 / * UIKit.framework * /; };
 */
-(NSString *) PBXBuildFile_Add :(NSDictionary *)child;
 
@end
 
@implementation pbxproj
 
-(void)dealloc{
    [_pb_frameworks_buildphase release];
    [_pb_frameworks release];
    [_pb_objects release];
    [_pb_dic release];
    [_pb_path release];
    [super dealloc];
}
 
+(instancetype)projectWithContentsOfFile:(NSString *)apath{
    pbxproj * pb = [ [ [pbxproj alloc] init ]  autorelease ];
    pb.pb_dic = [NSDictionary dictionaryWithContentsOfFile:apath];
    pb.pb_objects = pb.pb_dic[k_objects];
    pb.pb_path = apath;
    return pb;
}
 
-(NSArray *) frameworks{
    NSMutableArray * frameworks = [NSMutableArray array];
    for (NSString * __key in self.pb_frameworks[k_children]) {
        if (self.pb_objects[__key][k_name]) {
             [frameworks addObject:self.pb_objects[__key][k_name] ];
        }
        
    }
    return frameworks;
 
}
 
-(NSString *)newkey{
    if (self.pb_objects.allKeys.count) {
        __block NSString * min = self.pb_objects.allKeys[0];
        [self.pb_objects.allKeys enumerateObjectsUsingBlock:^(id obj, NSUInteger idx, BOOL *stop) {
            if ([pbkey compare:obj with:min] == -1) {
                min = obj;
            }
        }];
         
       return [pbkey next:min];
    }
    return nil;
}
 
-(BOOL)save{
     
     return self.pb_dic ? [self.pb_dic writeToFile:self.pb_path atomically:YES] : NO;
}
 
-(NSString *) PBXFileReference_Add :(NSDictionary *)child{
    NSString * key = [self newkey];
    if (key) {
        self.pb_objects[key] = child;
    }
    return key;
}
 
-(NSString *) PBXBuildFile_Add :(NSDictionary *)child{
    NSString * key = [self newkey];
    if (key) {
        self.pb_objects[key] = child;
    }
    return key;
}
 
-(BOOL) PBXGroup_Frameworks_AddChild :(NSString *) frameworkname{
    NSArray * frameworks = [self frameworks];
    for (NSString * str in frameworks) {
        if ([ frameworkname isEqualToString:str ]) {
            return NO;
        }
    }
     
    NSString * key = [self PBXFileReference_Add:@{
                      k_isa :kPBXFileReference,k_lastKnownFileType: @"wrapper.framework",
                      k_name : frameworkname,  k_path:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"System/Library/Frameworks/%@",frameworkname] ,
                      k_sourceTree :@"SDKROOT"
     }];
     
    if (key) {
 
        [self.pb_frameworks[k_children] addObject:key];
         
        key = [self PBXBuildFile_Add:@{k_fileRef:key,k_isa:kPBXBuildFile}];
 
        if (key) {
            [self.pb_frameworks_buildphase[k_files] addObject:key];
        }
 
    }
    return YES;
}
 
 
-(NSDictionary *)pb_frameworks{
    if (!_pb_frameworks) {
        for (NSString * key in self.pb_objects.allKeys) {
            NSDictionary * object = [ self.pb_objects[key] isKindOfClass:[NSDictionary class] ] ? self.pb_objects[key] : nil ;
            for (NSString * _key in object.allKeys) {
                if ([_key isEqualToString:k_isa]) {
                    NSString * isa_value = object[_key];
                    if ([isa_value isEqualToString:kPBXGroup] && [object[k_name] isEqualToString:kFrameworks]) {
                        _pb_frameworks = [object retain];
                        return _pb_frameworks;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
     
    return _pb_frameworks;
}
 
-(NSDictionary *)pb_frameworks_buildphase{
    if (!_pb_frameworks_buildphase) {
        for (NSString * key in self.pb_objects.allKeys) {
            NSDictionary * object = [ self.pb_objects[key] isKindOfClass:[NSDictionary class] ] ? self.pb_objects[key] : nil ;
            for (NSString * _key in object.allKeys) {
                if ([_key isEqualToString:k_isa]) {
                    NSString * isa_value = object[_key];
                    if ([isa_value isEqualToString:kPBXFrameworksBuildPhase]) {
                        _pb_frameworks_buildphase  = [object retain];
                        return _pb_frameworks_buildphase;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
    return _pb_frameworks_buildphase;
}
 
@end
 
 
int main(int argc, const char * argv[])
{
 
    @autoreleasepool {
         
        // insert code here...
        if (argc >= 2) {
             
            pbxproj * pb = [pbxproj projectWithContentsOfFile:pb(argv[1])];
            NSLog(@"%@",[pb frameworks]);
            for (int i = 2; i < argc; i++) {
                [pb PBXGroup_Frameworks_AddChild:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%s",argv[i] ]];
            }
             
            NSLog(@"%@",[pb frameworks]);
             
            [pb save];
 
        }    
    }
    return 0;
}

from AFNetworking


@interface NSString (urlencode)
  
-(NSString *)urlencode:(NSStringEncoding)encoding;
  
@end
  
@implementation NSString (urlencode)
  
- (NSString *) urlencode:(NSStringEncoding) encoding {
  
    static NSString * const kAFCharactersToBeEscaped = @":/?&=;+!@#$()~',*";
  
    static NSString * const kAFCharactersToLeaveUnescaped = @"[].";
  
    CFStringRef ref = CFURLCreateStringByAddingPercentEscapes(kCFAllocatorDefault, (CFStringRef)self, (CFStringRef)kAFCharactersToLeaveUnescaped, (CFStringRef)kAFCharactersToBeEscaped, CFStringConvertNSStringEncodingToEncoding(encoding));
  
    NSString * result = [NSStringstringWithFormat:@"%@",(NSString *)ref];
  
    CFRelease(ref);
  
    return result;
  
}
  
@end
  
  
staticNSString * AFPercentEscapedQueryStringPairMemberFromStringWithEncoding(NSString *string, NSStringEncoding encoding) {
  
    static NSString * const kAFCharactersToBeEscaped = @":/?&=;+!@#$()~',*";
  
    static NSString * const kAFCharactersToLeaveUnescaped = @"[].";
  
    return (__bridge_transfer  NSString *)CFURLCreateStringByAddingPercentEscapes(kCFAllocatorDefault, (__bridgeCFStringRef)string, (__bridgeCFStringRef)kAFCharactersToLeaveUnescaped, (__bridgeCFStringRef)kAFCharactersToBeEscaped, CFStringConvertNSStringEncodingToEncoding(encoding));
  
}

Post.Title: shit-1分钟广告时长
Post.Text:
第一步：屏蔽Hosts


在操作系统的Hosts文件（C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts）中加入如下内容：

#Youku
127.0.0.1       atm.youku.com
127.0.0.1       fvid.atm.youku.com
127.0.0.1       html.atm.youku.com
127.0.0.1       valb.atm.youku.com
127.0.0.1       valc.atm.youku.com
127.0.0.1       valf.atm.youku.com
127.0.0.1       valo.atm.youku.com
127.0.0.1       valp.atm.youku.com
127.0.0.1       vid.atm.youku.com
127.0.0.1       walp.atm.youku.com
127.0.0.1       lstat.youku.com
127.0.0.1       speed.lstat.youku.com
127.0.0.1       static.lstat.youku.com
127.0.0.1       urchin.lstat.youku.com
127.0.0.1       stat.youku.com


第二步：屏蔽Flash SharedObjects

首先找到Flash的SharedObjects存储路径，删除“static.youku.com”这个目录：

Windows XP：

C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\Macromedia\Flash Player\#SharedObjects\[随机数]\static.youku.com


Windows 7：

C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\Macromedia\Flash Player\#SharedObjects\[随机数]\static.youku.com
然后使用记事本新建一个文件，将文件名修改为“static.youku.com”（即扩展名为“.com”），这样Flash就无法正常读写SharedObjects，从而无法判断是否屏蔽广告了。

win7下在文件属性-安全标签下把static.youku.com设置为拒绝。

//
//  main.m
//  libDispatchQueues
//
//  Created by Nikolai Ruhe on 09.02.13.
//  Copyright (c) 2013 Nikolai Ruhe. All rights reserved.
//
          
#import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
          
int main(int argc, const char * argv[])
{
          
    @autoreleasepool {
        NSLog(@"startup on main thread: %s", [NSThread isMainThread] ? "YES" : "NO");
          
        // commit a block to a background queue
        dispatch_async(dispatch_get_global_queue(DISPATCH_QUEUE_PRIORITY_DEFAULT, 0), ^{
          
            // continuously send blocks to the main queue
            while (YES) {
                dispatch_sync(dispatch_get_main_queue(), ^{
                    NSLog(@"dispatch on main thread: %s", [NSThread isMainThread] ? "YES" : "NO");
                });
                sleep(1);
            }
        });
          
        // process main queue
        dispatch_main();
    }
    return 0;
}

/*!
 * @function dispatch_main
 *
 * @abstract
 * Execute blocks submitted to the main queue.
 *
 * @discussion
 * This function "parks" the main thread and waits for blocks to be submitted
 * to the main queue. This function never returns.

 */

//  UIViewController+CustomModal.h
//  Created by mysteriouss2 on 13-7-16.
//  Copyright (c) 2013. All rights reserved.

@interface UIViewController (CustomModal)
@property (nonatomic,readonly) BOOL isCustomModal;
- (void)presentCustomModalViewController:(UIViewController *)viewControllerToPresent animated: (BOOL)flag completion:(void (^)(void))completion NS_AVAILABLE_IOS(5_0);
-(void)dismissCustomModalViewControllerAnimated:(BOOL)flag completion:(void (^)(void))completion NS_AVAILABLE_IOS(5_0);
@end
        
#import <QuartzCore/QuartzCore.h>
        
static BOOL isCustomModal = NO;
        
@implementation UIViewController (CustomModal)
        
- (void)presentCustomModalViewController:(UIViewController *)viewControllerToPresent animated: (BOOL)flag completion:(void (^)(void))completion{
            
    UIViewController *sourceViewController = self;
    UIViewController *destinationViewController = viewControllerToPresent;
            
    //Setting the initial view based on whether the source controller is wrapper in a navigation controller or not
    UIView *initialView = sourceViewController.navigationController == nil ? sourceViewController.view : sourceViewController.navigationController.view;
            
    //add alpha-view with tag 999
    UIView * trans = [[UIView alloc] initWithFrame:initialView.bounds];
    trans.backgroundColor = [UIColor blackColor];
    trans.alpha = 0; trans.tag = 999;
    trans.autoresizingMask = UIViewAutoresizingFlexibleBottomMargin | UIViewAutoresizingFlexibleHeight | UIViewAutoresizingFlexibleLeftMargin |
 UIViewAutoresizingFlexibleRightMargin | UIViewAutoresizingFlexibleTopMargin | UIViewAutoresizingFlexibleWidth;
    [initialView addSubview:trans];
    [UIView animateWithDuration:.4 delay:0 options:UIViewAnimationOptionCurveEaseInOut animations:^{
        [initialView viewWithTag:999].alpha = 0.6;
    } completion:NULL];
#   if !__has_feature(objc_arc)
    [trans release];
#   endif
            
    //The initial transform is just a translation (Pushing the view slightly behind). To avoid overlapping views during transition
    CATransform3D initialTransform = CATransform3DMakeTranslation(0, 0, -10);
            
    //Rotation of 60 degrees around the x axis
    CATransform3D finalTransform = CATransform3DMakeRotation(M_PI/12, 1, 0, 0);
            
    //The m34 is used for setting the perspective, the position of the camera. 1/200 here means that the camera is 200 point in front of the view
    finalTransform.m34 = 1.0/200.0;
            
    //Setting the animation parameters. From and To transforms, duration, timing function, etc
    CABasicAnimation *animation = [CABasicAnimation animationWithKeyPath:@"transform"];
    initialView.layer.transform = initialTransform;
    [animation setFromValue:[NSValue valueWithCATransform3D:initialTransform]];
    [animation setToValue:[NSValue valueWithCATransform3D:finalTransform]];
    [animation setDuration:.8];
    [animation setTimingFunction:[CAMediaTimingFunction functionWithName:kCAMediaTimingFunctionEaseInEaseOut]];
    [animation setFillMode:kCAFillModeForwards];
    [animation setRemovedOnCompletion:YES];
    [animation setDelegate:self];
            
    //Setting the anchor point and position of the layer to be at the lower middle of the view for the transformation
    //Position has to be set to be in sync with anchor point. First time shifting issue.
    //Also, the position has to be based on the device orientation
    initialView.layer.position = [self getPositionForOrientation:sourceViewController.interfaceOrientation andFrame:initialView.layer.frame];
            
    //Setting the anchor point. Anchor point is independent of the device orientation
    initialView.layer.anchorPoint = CGPointMake(0.5, 1.0);
            
    //Setting the key to be transform to override the default and not cause conflicting animations
    [initialView.layer addAnimation:animation forKey:@"transform"];
            
    [sourceViewController presentViewController:destinationViewController animated:YES completion:^(void) {
        //Resetting the anchor point and position for rotation issue fix
        CGRect frame = initialView.layer.frame;
        CGPoint positionInFrame = CGPointMake(CGRectGetMidX(frame), CGRectGetMidY(frame));
        initialView.layer.position = positionInFrame;
        initialView.layer.anchorPoint = CGPointMake(0.5, 0.5);
    }];
    isCustomModal = YES;
        
}
-(void)dismissCustomModalViewControllerAnimated:(BOOL)flag completion:(void (^)(void))completion{
        
    //Getting the source and the destination controller
    UIViewController *sourceViewController = self.presentingViewController;
    UIViewController *destinationViewController =(UIViewController *) self;
            
    //Setting the initial view based on whether the source controller is wrapper in a navigation controller or not
    UIView *initialView = sourceViewController.navigationController == nil ? sourceViewController.view : sourceViewController.navigationController.view;
            
    //The initial transform is just a translation (Pushing the view slightly behind). To avoid overlapping views during transition
    CATransform3D initialTransform = CATransform3DMakeTranslation(0, 0, -10);
            
    //Rotation of 60 degrees around the x axis
    CATransform3D finalTransform = CATransform3DMakeRotation(M_PI/12, 1, 0, 0);
            
    //The m34 is used for setting the perspective, the position of the camera. 1/200 here means that the camera is 200 point in front of the view
    finalTransform.m34 = 1.0/200.0;
            
    //Setting the animation parameters. From and To transforms, duration, timing function, etc
    CABasicAnimation *animation = [CABasicAnimation animationWithKeyPath:@"transform"];
    //    initialView.layer.transform = initialTransform;
    [animation setFromValue:[NSValue valueWithCATransform3D:finalTransform]];
    [animation setToValue:[NSValue valueWithCATransform3D:initialTransform]];
    [animation setDuration:.4];
    [animation setTimingFunction:[CAMediaTimingFunction functionWithName:kCAMediaTimingFunctionEaseInEaseOut]];
    [animation setFillMode:kCAFillModeForwards];
    [animation setRemovedOnCompletion:YES];
    [animation setDelegate:self];
            
    //Setting the anchor point and position of the layer to be at the lower middle of the view for the transformation
    //Position has to be set to be in sync with anchor point. First time shifting issue.
    //Also, the position has to be based on the device orientation
    initialView.layer.position = [self getPositionForOrientation:sourceViewController.interfaceOrientation andFrame:initialView.layer.frame];
            
    //Setting the anchor point. Anchor point is independent of the device orientation
    initialView.layer.anchorPoint = CGPointMake(0.5, 1.0);
            
    //Setting the key to be transform to override the default and not cause conflicting animations
    [initialView.layer addAnimation:animation forKey:@"transform"];
            
            
    [UIView animateWithDuration:.6 delay:0 options:UIViewAnimationOptionCurveEaseInOut animations:^{
        [initialView viewWithTag:999].alpha = 0;
    } completion:^(BOOL finished) {
        [[initialView viewWithTag:999] removeFromSuperview];
    }];
            
    [destinationViewController dismissViewControllerAnimated:flag completion:^{
        CGRect frame = initialView.layer.frame;
        CGPoint positionInFrame = CGPointMake(CGRectGetMidX(frame), CGRectGetMidY(frame));
        initialView.layer.position = positionInFrame;
        initialView.layer.anchorPoint = CGPointMake(0.5, 0.5);
        if (completion) {
            completion();
        }
    }];
    isCustomModal = NO;
        
}
        
//This method will give the
- (CGPoint) getPositionForOrientation:(UIInterfaceOrientation)orientation andFrame:(CGRect)frame
{
    switch (orientation) {
        case UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait:
            return CGPointMake(CGRectGetMidX(frame), CGRectGetMaxY(frame));
        case UIInterfaceOrientationPortraitUpsideDown:
            return CGPointMake(CGRectGetMidX(frame), CGRectGetMinY(frame));
        case UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft:
            return CGPointMake(CGRectGetHeight(frame),CGRectGetWidth(frame)/2.0 );
        case UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight:
            return CGPointMake(0, CGRectGetWidth(frame)/2.0);
        default:
            break;
    }
}
        
-(BOOL) isCustomModal{
    return isCustomModal;
}
        
@end

@end

LUA中关于正则表达式是本文要介绍的内容，LUA中的正则表达式跟传统的不一样,作者特把手册里一段关于正则说明抄下来,做个记录,这些只是简单的说明一下LUA中正则的则规,对于后面的高级应用以后再慢慢研究,红色部分为LUA中常用正则表达式说明 . ...模式匹配函数

在string库中功能最强大的函数是：string.find (字符串查找), string.gsub (全局字符串替换), and string.gfind (全局字符串查找). 这些函数都是基于模式匹配的。

与其他脚本语言不同的是，Lua并不使用POSIX规范的正则表达式(也写作regexp)来进行模式匹配(译者：POSIX是unix的工业标准,regexp最初来源于unix,POSIX对regexp也作了规范)。主要的原因出于程序大小方面的考虑：实现一个典型的符合POSIX标准的regexp大概需要4000行代码，这比整个Lua标准库加在一起都大。权衡之下，Lua中的模式匹配的实现只用了500行代码，当然这意味着不可能实现POSIX所规范的所有更能。然而，Lua中的模式匹配功能是很强大的，并且包含了一些使用标准POSIX模式匹配不容易实现的功能。

string.find的基本应用就是用来在目标串(subject string)内搜索匹配指定的模式的串。函数如果找到匹配的串返回他的位置，否则返回nil.最简单的模式就是一个单词，仅仅匹配单词本身。比如，模式'hello'仅仅匹配目标串中的"hello"。当查找到模式的时候，函数返回两个值：匹配串开始索引和结束索引。

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. s = "hello world" 
    2. 
  
  
  
  2. i, j = string.find(s, "hello")  
    3. 
  
  
  
  3. print(i, j)                      --> 1    5  
    4. 
  
  
  
  4. print(string.sub(s, i, j))       --> hello  
    5. 
  
  
  
  5. print(string.find(s, "world"))   --> 7    11  
    6. 
  
  
  
  6. i, j = string.find(s, "l")  
    7. 
  
  
  
  7. print(i, j)                      --> 3    3  
    8. 
  
  
  
  8. print(string.find(s, "lll"))     --> nil 
    9.

例子中，匹配成功的时候，string.sub利用string.find返回的值截取匹配的子串。 (对简单模式而言，匹配的就是其本身。)

string.find函数第三个参数是可选的：标示目标串中搜索的起始位置。当我们想查找目标串中所有匹配的子串的时候，这个选项非常有用。我们可以不断的循环搜索，每一次从前一次匹配的结束位置开始。下面看一个例子，下面的代码用一个字符串中所有的新行构造一个表：

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. local t = {}                   -- table to store the indices  
    2. 
  
  
  
  2. local i = 0 
    3. 
  
  
  
  3. while true do  
    4. 
  
  
  
  4.   i = string.find(s, "\n", i+1)    -- find 'next' newline  
    5. 
  
  
  
  5.   if i == nil then break end  
    6. 
  
  
  
  6.   table.insert(t, i)  
    7. 
  
  
  
  7. end 
    8.

后面我们还会看到可以使用string.gfind迭代子来简化上面这个循环。

string.gsub函数有三个参数：目标串，模式串，替换串。他基本作用是用来查找匹配模式的串，并将使用替换串其替换掉:

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. s = string.gsub("Lua is cute", "cute", "great")  
    2. 
  
  
  
  2. print(s)         --> Lua is great  
    3. 
  
  
  
  3. s = string.gsub("all lii", "l", "x")  
    4. 
  
  
  
  4. print(s)         --> axx xii  
    5. 
  
  
  
  5. s = string.gsub("Lua is great", "perl", "tcl")  
    6. 
  
  
  
  6. print(s)         --> Lua is great 
    7.

第四个参数是可选的，用来限制替换的范围：

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. s = string.gsub("all lii", "l", "x", 1)  
    2. 
  
  
  
  2. print(s)          --> axl lii  
    3. 
  
  
  
  3. s = string.gsub("all lii", "l", "x", 2)  
    4. 
  
  
  
  4. print(s)          --> axx lii 
    5.

string.gsub的第二个返回值表示他进行替换操作的次数。例如，下面代码涌来计算一个字符串中空格出现的次数：

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. _, count = string.gsub(str, " ", " ") 
    2.

(注意, _ 只是一个哑元变量.)

模式

你还可以在模式串中使用字符类。字符类指可以匹配一个特定字符集合内任何字符的模式项。比如，字符类 %d 匹配任意数字. 所以你可以使用模式串'%d%d/%d%d/%d%d%d%d'搜索dd/mm/yyyy 格式的日期 :

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. s = "Deadline is 30/05/1999, firm" 
    2. 
  
  
  
  2. date = "%d%d/%d%d/%d%d%d%d" 
    3. 
  
  
  
  3. print(string.sub(s, string.find(s, date)))   --> 30/05/1999 
    4.

下面的表列出了Lua支持的所有字符类:

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. .        任意字符  
    2. 
  
  
  
  2.  %a        字母  
    3. 
  
  
  
  3.  %c        控制字符  
    4. 
  
  
  
  4.  %d        数字  
    5. 
  
  
  
  5.  %l        小写字母  
    6. 
  
  
  
  6.  %p        标点字符  
    7. 
  
  
  
  7.  %s        空白符  
    8. 
  
  
  
  8.  %u        大写字母  
    9. 
  
  
  
  9.  %w        字母和数字  
    10. 
  
  
  
  10.  %x        十六进制数字  
    11. 
  
  
  
  11.  %z        代表0的字符 
    12.

上面字符类的大写形式表示小写所代表的集合的补集。例如, '%A'非字母的字符:

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. print(string.gsub("hello, up-down!", "%A", "."))  
    2. 
  
  
  
  2.   --> hello..up.down. 4 
    3.

(数字4不是字符串结果的一部分，他是gsub返回的第二个结果，代表发生替换的次数。下面其他的关于打印gsub结果的例子中将会忽略这个数值。 ) 在模式匹配中有一些特殊字符，他们有特殊的意义，Lua中的特殊字符如下：

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. ( ) . % + - * ? [ ^ $ 
    2.

`%′用作特殊字符的转义字符，因此 '%.' 匹配点; '%%'匹配字符 `%′ .转义字符`%′不仅可以用来转义特殊字符，还可以用于所有的非字母的字符。当对一个字符有疑问的时候，为安全起见请使用转义字符转义他。

对Lua而言，模式串就是普通的字符串。他们和其他的字符串没有区别，也不会受到特殊对待。只有他们被用作模式串用于函数的时候，`%′才作为转义字符。所以，如果你需要在一个模式串内放置引号的话，你必须使用在其他的字符串中放置引号的方法来处理，使用`\′转义引号，`\′是Lua的转义符。你可以使用方括号将字符类或者字符括起来创建自己的字符类(译者：Lua称之为char-set，就是指传统正则表达式概念中的括号表达式)。比如，'[%w_]'将匹配字母数字和下划线，'[01]'匹配二进制数字，'[%[%]]'匹配一对方括号。下面的例子统计文本中元音字母出现的次数：

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. _, nvow = string.gsub(text, "[AEIOUaeiou]", "") 
    2.

在char-set中可以使用范围表示字符的集合，第一个字符和最后一个字符之间用连字符连接表示这两个字符之间范围内的字符集合。大部分的常用字符范围都已经预定义好了，所以一般你不需要自己定义字符的集合。比如，'%d'表示 '[0-9]'；'%x'表示'[0-9a-fA-F]'。然而，如果你想查找八进制数，你可能更喜欢使用'[0-7]'而不是'[01234567]'。你可以在字符集(char-set)的开始处使用 `^′ 表示其补集: '[^0-7]' 匹配任何不是八进制数字的字符； '[^\n]' 匹配任何非换行符户的字符。记住，可以使用大写的字符类表示其补集： '%S'比'[^%s]'要简短些.

Lua的字符类依赖于本地环境，所以'[a-z]'可能与'%l'表示的字符集不同。在一般情况下，后者包括`?? 和 `??，而前者没有。应该尽可能的使用后者来表示字母，除非出于某些特殊考虑，因为后者更简单、方便、更高效。

可以使用修饰符来修饰模式增强模式的表达能力，Lua中的模式修饰符有四个：

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. +        匹配前一字符1次或多次  
    2. 
  
  
  
  2. *         匹配前一字符0次或多次  
    3. 
  
  
  
  3. -        匹配前一字符0次或多次  
    4. 
  
  
  
  4. ?        匹配前一字符0次或1次 
    5.

`+′ 匹配一个或多个字符，她总是进行最长的匹配. 比如，模式串 '%a+'匹配一个或多个字母或者一个单词 :

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. print(string.gsub("one, and two; and three", "%a+", "word"))  
    2. 
  
  
  
  2.   --> word, word word; word word 
    3.

'%d+'匹配一个或多个数字 (整数):

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. i, j = string.find("the number 1298 is even", "%d+")  
    2. 
  
  
  
  2.                         print(i,j)   --> 12  15 
    3.

`*′ 与 `+′类似, 但是他匹配一个字符0次或多次出现.一个典型的应用是匹配空白。比如，为了匹配一对圆括号()或者( )之间的空白，可以使用'%(%s*%)'. ( '%s*'用来匹配0个或多个空白. 由于圆括号在模式中有特殊的含义，所以我们必须使用`%′转义他.) 再看一个例子，'[_%a][_%w]*'匹配Lua程序中的标示符：字母或者下划线开头的字母下划线数字序列。

`-′与`*′一样，都匹配一个字符的0次或多次出现，但是他进行的是最短匹配。某些时候这两个用起来没有区别，但有些时候结果将截然不同。比如，如果你使用模式'[_%a][_%w]-'来查找标示符，你将只能找到第一个字母，因为'[_%w]-'永远匹配空。另一方面，假定你想查找C程序中的注释，很多人可能使用 '/%*.*%*/' (也就是说 "/*" 后面跟着任意多个字符，然后跟着 "*/"). 然而，由于 '.*'进行的是最长匹配，这个模式将匹配程序中第一个"/*" 和最后一个"*/"之间所有部分:

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. test = "int x; /* x */  int y; /* y */" 
    2. 
  
  
  
  2. print(string.gsub(test, "/%*.*%*/", "<COMMENT>"))  
    3. 
  
  
  
  3.   --> int x; <COMMENT> 
    4.

然而模式 '.-'进行的是最短匹配，她会匹配"/*"开始到第一个"*/"之前的部分:

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. test = "int x; /* x */  int y; /* y */" 
    2. 
  
  
  
  2. print(string.gsub(test, "/%*.-%*/", "<COMMENT>"))  
    3. 
  
  
  
  3.     --> int x; <COMMENT>  int y; <COMMENT> 
    4.

`?′匹配一个字符0次或1次.举个例子，假定我们想在一段文本内查找一个整数，整数可能带有正负号。 模式 '[+-]?%d+'符合我们的要求，她可以匹配 像 "-12", "23" 和 "+1009"等数字. '[+-]' 是一个匹配`+′或者 `-′的字符类；接下来的 `?′意思是匹配前面的字符类0次或者1次.

与其他系统的模式不同的是，Lua中的修饰符不能用字符类；不能将模式分组然后使用修饰符作用这个分组。比如，没有一个模式可以匹配一个可选的单词(除非这个单词只有一个字母)。下面我将看到，通常你可以使用一些高级技术绕开这个限制。

以`^′开头的模式只匹配目标串的开始部分，相似的，以`$′结尾的模式只匹配目标串的结尾部分。这不仅可以用来限制你要查找的模式，还可以定位(anchor)模式。比如：

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. if string.find(s, "^%d") then ...  
    2. 
  
  
  
  2. 符串s是否以数字开头，而   
    3. 
  
  
  
  3. if string.find(s, "^[+-]?%d+$") then ... 
    4.

检查字符串s是否是一个整数。

'%b'用来匹配对称的字符.常写为 '%bxy',x和y是任意两个不同的字符；x作为匹配的开始,y作为匹配的结束。比如， '%b()'匹配以`(′开始， 以 `)′结束的字符串: 

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. print(string.gsub("a (enclosed (in) parentheses) line",  
    2. 
  
  
  
  2.                   "%b()", ""))  
    3. 
  
  
  
  3.   --> a  line 
    4.

常用的这种模式有： '%b()', '%b[]', '%b%{%}',和 '%b<>'。你也可以使用任何字符作为分隔符。

作者提出问题的原帖：

由于看到TheoryCraft这个不错的插件,查找网站发现一年来竟然没人汉化,同时为了学习,决定自己动手试试,但在看代码时遇见一些问题,特请教各位大大

首先我贴一段插件中的代码来分析：

 
 
 
    
  
  
  
  1. TheoryCraft_MeleeComboEnergyConverter = "into (.-) additional" 
    2. 
  
  
  
  2. TheoryCraft_MeleeComboReader = "(%d+) point(.-): (%d+)%-(%d+) damage" 
    3. 
  
  
  
  3. TheoryCraft_MeleeComboReplaceWith = "$points$ point%1: %2%-%3 damage" 
    4.

第一行中的(.-)有点怪,是什么意思,如果要翻译的这句话时要如何处理,

第二行中%这个符号是否相当于转位符/,是不是LUA中特有的替代/

第三行中$我看正则表达式中好象是串位符,但为什么会放在第一个?

小结：详解LUA中关于正则表达式的内容介绍完了，希望通过本文的学习能对你有所帮助！

;(function($) {

   $(function() {

       var url=document.referrer;

       if ( url && url.search("http://")>-1) {

           var refurl =  url.match(/:\/\/(.[^/]+)/)[1];

           if(refurl.indexOf("baidu.com")>-1){

               $('#nobaidu_dlg').bPopup();

           }

       }

   });

})(jQuery);

</script>

<div id="nobaidu_dlg" style="background-color:#fff; border-radius:15px;color:#000;display:none;padding:20px;min-width:450px;min-height:180px;">

Post.Title: iOS-PHP AES128
Post.Text:
OC按PKCS7Padding填充，PHP按ZeroPadding填充，解密结果一致。。。

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Block_cipher_modes_of_operation

<?php
 
header("content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8");
 
function encrypt($plaintext){
 
  $key = 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx'; //key of 16 bytes
 
  $plaintext_utf8 = utf8_encode($plaintext);
 
  $ciphertext = mcrypt_encrypt(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, $key,
 
   $plaintext_utf8, MCRYPT_MODE_CBC, $key );
 
  return base64_encode($ciphertext);
 
}
 
function decrypt($ciphertext){
 
  $key = ' xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx';
 
  $plaintext_utf8_dec = mcrypt_decrypt(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, $key,
 
 base64_decode($ciphertext), MCRYPT_MODE_CBC, $key );
 
  return $plaintext_utf8_dec;
 
}
 
?>

 

 

#import <CommonCrypto/CommonCryptor.h>
   
   
@implementation NSData (AESCrypt)
   
- (NSData *)AES128EncryptWithKey:(NSString *)key
   
{
       
    // 'key' should be 16 bytes for AES128, will be null-padded otherwise
       
    char keyPtr[kCCKeySizeAES128 + 1]; // room for terminator (unused)
       
    bzero( keyPtr, sizeof( keyPtr ) ); // fill with zeroes (for padding)
       
    // fetch key data
       
    [key getCString:keyPtr maxLength:sizeof( keyPtr ) encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
       
    NSUInteger dataLength = [self length];
       
    NSLog(@"dataLength:%u",dataLength);
       
    //See the doc: For block ciphers, the output size will always be less than or
       
    //equal to the input size plus the size of one block.
       
    //That's why we need to add the size of one block here
       
    size_t bufferSize = dataLength + kCCBlockSizeAES128;
       
    void *buffer = malloc( bufferSize );
       
    size_t numBytesEncrypted = 0;
       
    CCCryptorStatus cryptStatus = CCCrypt( kCCEncrypt, kCCAlgorithmAES128, kCCOptionPKCS7Padding,
                                             
                                          keyPtr, kCCKeySizeAES128,
                                             
                                          [[key dataUsingEncoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding] bytes]
                                             
                                          /* initialization vector (optional) */,
                                             
                                          [self bytes], dataLength, /* input */
                                             
                                          buffer, bufferSize, /* output */
                                             
                                          &numBytesEncrypted );
       
    if( cryptStatus == kCCSuccess )
           
    {
           
        //the returned NSData takes ownership of the buffer and will free it on deallocation
           
        return [NSData dataWithBytesNoCopy:buffer length:numBytesEncrypted];
           
    }
       
    free( buffer ); //free the buffer
       
    return nil;
       
}
   
   
   
- (NSData *)AES128DecryptWithKey:(NSString *)key
   
{
       
    // 'key' should be 16 bytes for AES128, will be null-padded otherwise
       
    char keyPtr[kCCKeySizeAES128+1]; // room for terminator (unused)
       
    bzero( keyPtr, sizeof( keyPtr ) ); // fill with zeroes (for padding)
       
    // fetch key data
       
    [key getCString:keyPtr maxLength:sizeof( keyPtr ) encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
       
    NSUInteger dataLength = [self length];
       
    //See the doc: For block ciphers, the output size will always be less than or
       
    //equal to the input size plus the size of one block.
       
    //That's why we need to add the size of one block here
       
    size_t bufferSize = dataLength + kCCBlockSizeAES128;
       
    void *buffer = malloc( bufferSize );
       
    size_t numBytesDecrypted = 0;
       
    CCCryptorStatus cryptStatus = CCCrypt( kCCDecrypt, kCCAlgorithmAES128, kCCOptionPKCS7Padding,
                                             
                                          keyPtr, kCCKeySizeAES128,
                                             
                                          [[key dataUsingEncoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding] bytes]
                                             
                                          /* initialization vector (optional) */,
                                             
                                          [self bytes], dataLength, /* input */
                                             
                                          buffer, bufferSize, /* output */
                                             
                                          &numBytesDecrypted );   
       
    if( cryptStatus == kCCSuccess )
           
    {
           
        //the returned NSData takes ownership of the buffer and will free it on deallocation
           
        return [NSData dataWithBytesNoCopy:buffer length:numBytesDecrypted];
           
    }   
       
    free( buffer ); //free the buffer
       
    return nil;
       
}
   
@end

‘These are hard times for dreamers.

Post.Text:

Post.Title: Build and use dylib on iOS
Post.Text:
local testfw = NSBundle:bundleWithPath("frameworkpath")

if testfw then testfw:load() wax.class["testfw"]:show() testfw:unload() end

by http://blog.iosplace.com/?p=33

Xcode does not allow you to build dylib for iOS. App will be rejected if it’s not single binary. But I have an application that has plug-in architecture to load optional modules. I just want a quick prototype to prove concept before fully port it to iOS. It’s faster to do if dylib could simply work. So, this post shows how to build and use dylib but be aware it won’t be approved to App Store. (Tested with Xcode 3.2.4 on 10.6.4)

1. Open these files in the Property List Editor: “/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/Library/Xcode/Specifications/MacOSX Product Types.xcspec” and “/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneSimulator.platform/Developer/Library/Xcode/Specifications/iPhone Simulator ProductTypes.xcspec”

2. Locate the item in the “MacOSX Product Types.xcspec” that has the product type “com.apple.product-type.library.dynamic” and drag it to the “iPhone Simulator ProductTypes.xcspec”.

3. Open “MacOSX Package Types.xcspec” and “iPhone Simulator PackageTypes.xcspec” found at the same places.

4. Locate the item in the “MacOSX Product Types.xcspec” that has the package type “com.apple.package-type.mach-o-dylib” and drag it to the “iPhone Simulator PackageTypes.xcspec”.

5. Repeat the steps for the “iPhoneOS.platform” and relaunch Xcode if it was running.

Now, lets build a dylib. Start out with the “Cocoa Touch Static Library” Templete. That should included the Foundation.framework in the project. Here are the changes I made on top of the templete to build dylib.

 

1. Open the file “project.pbxproj” (found inside the Xcode project file bundle) in a Text Editor. Search for string “producttype”, change it’s value to “com.apple.product-type.library.dynamic”;

Now, open the project with Xcode, go to Project->Edit Project Settings

2. “Installation Directory” set to @executable_path/ because I plan to put the dylib in the same directory as the app’s executable.

2. “Mach-O Type” set to Dynamic Library

3. “Executable Extension” set to dylib

4. “Executable Prefix” set to empty

5. Add one or two simple methods to the library and build it.

Post.Title: lua <=> wax <=> cocos2d(ObjC)
Post.Text:
waxClass{"HelloWorldLayer",CCLayer}

function HelloWorldLayer: scene()

local scene = CCScene: init()

local layer = HelloWorldLayer: init()

scene:addChild(layer)

return scene;

 end

 

function HelloWorldLayer: init()

self = super:init()

if self then

local label = CCLabelTTF: labelWithString_fontName_fontSize("Hello World","Marker Felt",35)

local size = CCDirector: sharedDirector(): winSize()

label:setPosition (CGPoint( size.width /2 , 45 ) )

self:addChild(label)

self:addChild(CCParticleSystemQuad:particleWithFile("BurstPipe.plist"))

local menuItem = CCMenuItemImage:itemWithNormalImage_selectedImage_target_selector("close.png","close.png",self,"back")

menuItem:setPosition(CGPoint(0,0))

local menu = CCMenu:menuWithArray({menuItem,nil})

menu:setPosition(CGPoint(25,420))

self:addChild(menu)

end

return self

end

 

function HelloWorldLayer:back()

(CCDirector:sharedDirector().parentVC):dismissModalViewControllerAnimated(true)

end
